product_desc: We are a small self publishing company eager to help blossoming writters to become budding authors. We seek to polish accepted transcript into a brilliant gem, at which time we will Publish with an assigned ISBN, Advertise with our web stores, have the manuscripts Reviewed for others to see, and Distribute to all major outlets. The author will also have access to reduced priced copies of the work after it's been published as well on top of the free copies delievered after publication. The publication costs are much lower than that of our competitors with the added benefit of personal support. Our authors have a story to tell, whether it is a cook book, a how to, or a novel, each will be treated with the same respect and importance as we work through the process together.
high_concept: You have a voice, let the world read it
name: Factor Fiction Publishing
